mapper.insert: insert into STOCK_DATA (CODE, PRICE_DATE, PRICE_OPEN, PRICE_HIGH, PRICE_LOW, PRICE_CLOSE, PRICE_VOLUME) select #{code}, #{date}, #{open}, #{high}, #{low}, #{close}, #{volume} from dual where not exists( select 1 from stock_data where code = #{code} and price_date = #{date} )
mapper.select: select price_date as "date", price_open as open, price_high as high, price_low as low, price_close as close, price_volume as volume from stock_data where code = (select c.code from stock_code c where c.name = #{name}) order by price_date asc
select c.code from stock_code c where c.name = #{name}
